description:
Description


LARGE CAPACITY & LONG-LASTING SCENT: This premium diffuser set includes two 16.9 fl oz (500ml) bottles, designed to fill large spaces with a rich and enduring fragrance. Enjoy continuous scent diffusion for months, with the flexibility to transfer the fragrance into smaller bottles for added convenience. Compatible with all reed sticks for an effortless aromatic experience.
REFINED FRAGRANCE CRAFTED BY EXPERTS: Developed by top perfumers, this diffuser features exclusive, non-standardized scents unique to HETRAS. The luxurious aroma creates a signature ambiance, elevating any environment with its sophisticated and well-balanced fragrance.
ELEGANT INTERIOR ENHANCEMENT: A blend of functionality and style, this chic diffuser enhances any room—living spaces, offices, or bathrooms—without the need for flames or electricity. Its sleek design complements a variety of interior styles, offering both aesthetic appeal and practical use.
LUXURIOUS GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: Presented in a beautifully designed package, this premium diffuser makes a thoughtful and elegant gift for housewarmings, birthdays, weddings, and holidays. Give the gift of refined ambiance, turning any space into a haven of comfort and relaxation.

description:
Instagram에서 이 게시물 보기            STYLEKOREAN(@stylekorean_global)님의 공유 게시물

Description


RETURNITY guasha made with firm beauty complete with time and sincerity.
RETURNITY guasha is directly designed and enhance in workshop based on 10 years of guasha massage experience.
 
How To Use

Wave A zone: Scalp, hairline, forehead, cheek, collarbone, shoulder, trapezius, chest, armpit, groin, calf, ankle, sole
Wave B zone: Scalp, hairline on the neck, legs, arms, chest
Acupressure zone: Scalp, neck, leg, sole, knotted muscles
Point zone: Around eyes, sole, knotted muscles
Round zone: Lymph message, groin, calf, sole
V zone: Chin, cheekbones, collarbone, neck, shoulder
TIP
1. For more effective blood circulation, microwave the product for warm and nice massage.
2. For more effective and quicker removal of swollen face, keep the product in refrigerator for 10-15 minutes before use.
 
Key Ingredients

Completed test for non-detection of harmful substances for carefree massage.
100% handmade porcelain RETURNITY guasha made by a craftsman.
The high density white clay was fired for 3 times in 28 hours to make a firm and solid traditional porcelain guasha.

Instagram에서 이 게시물 보기            STYLEKOREAN(@stylekorean_global)님의 공유 게시물

Description


Makes the start of the daily cycle easy.
Adheres lightly and comfortably to the skin, providing care as if nothing is applied.
Features a signature triple structure and a patented dual stimulation method.
 
How To Use

1. Wash and dry the area to be applied.
2. Remove the patch and apply it to the ear.
3. After 4-48 hours, gently remove it.
 
Key Ingredients

Provides fast and extensive stimulation using the magnetic field of neodymium and physical stimulation from the ergonomically designed V-PIN.

description: DescriptionWith the mechanism of cryotherapy, relieves skin heat to solve various skin problems.The wide cooling plate (diameter 75mm) with the easy to grip handle can help the relieving care for both face and body swelling by massaging them gently. Suggested Use1. Keep it in the fridge or freezer more than 3 hours.2. Before use, wipe the cooling plate with soft cloth and leave it for1-2 minutes after removing it from the fridge or freezer.3. Gently press and massage skin with the applicator.4. After use, wash it in running water thoroughly and wipe it with dry cloth.*Do not use longer than 20 minutes at a time. Do not apply it to a particular part for a long time.*Cold temperature can irritate sensitive skin. For sensitive skin, highly recommended to keep it in the fridge only.

description:
Description

[Foundation Spatula for Even Application] - It’s not easy to apply foundation evenly with hands or makeup brushes. Use foundation spatula for even application and natural expression.
[Foundation Spatula with Additional Blade] - With an additional small blade, you can apply foundation effectively on narrow spots like the nose or chin.
[Durable & Clean Makeup Tool] - STUDIO17 Foundation Spatula is made of durable stainless steel. You can keep the hygiene of the spatula by wiping with wet tissue.
[Leather Pouch Included] - Artificial leather pouch is included for easy store and portability. Keep the spatula in a clean state.

How To Use

1. Put the foundation with a spatula's blade. 
2. Spread the foundation on the face with the spatula's blade edge. 
3. Finish the base makeup by touching with puffs. 
4. Clean the spatula and store in a leather case.

product_name: Vela Contour V Lift  LED Neck Care
description: DescriptionExperience the ultimate in neck and décolleté care with the ANACIS Vela Contour V Lift LED Neck Care. Specially designed to target sagging, wrinkles, and loss of firmness, this innovative device combines advanced LED technology with ergonomic design for optimal skin rejuvenation. The red LED light penetrates deep into the skin layers to stimulate collagen production, while the gentle vibration therapy enhances blood circulation and promotes a tighter, more sculpted neckline. Lightweight and easy to use, it helps restore a youthful and contoured appearance with consistent use.How To Use1. Cleanse and dry the neck area thoroughly before use.2. Apply a suitable serum or cream if desired.3. Turn on the device and select the desired LED mode.4. Gently glide the device upward along the neck and jawline.5. Use for 5–10 minutes per session, 3–4 times a week for best results.6. Clean the device after each use with a soft, dry cloth.

description:
Description


One stick burns for approx. 15 minutes. Each stick is about 0.1 in (2.5mm) thick, and 5.5 in (14cm) long.
One box contains ~30g (1.06 oz), which is about 60-70 sticks
Our incense sticks do not have the Bamboo core, thus produces less smoke & burning smell, but more scents.
Made of natural fragrances, and none synthetic. Made in Korea.
Designed to perfectly match our incense holders (brass / walnut wood).

description:
Description


- A mild and refreshing shine muscat-flavored mouthwash in portable sticks that offers a gentle and fresh scent.
- Alcohol-free formula that does not cause any burning sensation or oral irritation.
- Contains naturally derived ingredients like Centella Asiatica Extract and Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract to eliminate bacteria and keep mouth hydrated.
- Contains Sodium Fluoride to form a Fluoride barrier on teeth to protect teeth from decaying and effectively remove bacteria and tartar.
- Mild and gentle formula with no articial colorant and surfactants.
How To Use

Rinse mouth for 30 seconds with the product and spit out. Use twice a day.

description:
Description

The Benton Pore Clear Brush is a cleansing brush made from quick-drying antibacterial silicone. It contains 4 000 micro bristles, each 0.4 mm thick, which assist to gently exfoliate dead skin cells and clear out dirt and sebum from your pores much better than what your bare hands are capable of. The brush has an air pump mechanism which ensures that is comfortable to use on your skin and prevents irritations. The brush comes with a convenient holder that can be fixed on glass or mirrored surfaces to help dry and store it.

This pore brush is perfect for:

-Oily skin or skin that has a lot of sebum
-Skin that has trouble with whiteheads and blackheads
-Dull skin or skin with dead skin cells

Suggested Use

1 Pump 3-5 times using the piston (top part of the handle) to inflate the brush cushion.
2 Press the central button on the top part to adjust the softness of the brush according to your preference. Softer cushions are more suitable for sensitive skin while harder cushions are better for exfoliating. 
3 Apply an already-lathered foam cleanser to your skin.
4 Massage your face with the Benton Pore Clear Brush in circular motions to cleanse it.
5 Rinse your face with water. Rinse the brush thoroughly with tap water and store it on the holder that comes with it.

original_name: [double dare] OMG! Man In Black Hairband

description:
Description

Sticks firmly to the skin! Complete smooth, matte skin makeup!
 - Evenly applies makeup base and foundation with a natural glow
 - Just gently pat onto skin to cover pores and increase coverage, making skin look smooth and matte 
 - Effective for applying multiple layers 


Suggested Use

Place a dab of makeup product on the sponge and gently press the sponge on the desired skin area

product_name: My Beauty Tool Lovely Etti Hair Band
description:
Description

My Beauty Tool Lovely Etti Hair Band, stretchy and soft with adorable cat ears. Wear the band to keep the hair away from your face while cleansing, putting on makeup, using a mask or taking a shower.

Suggested Use

Wear the Etti hair band to hold your hair up.
